Posts.Content: hello, sorry if this is interupting anyones night but i just need to ask the question.. what is aromasin exemstane? my mum got diagnosed breast cancer 5 years ago, nearly 6 now and now my mum doesnt like to tell me when shes at the hospital or if anythings happened like its come back or anything, and ive just found this leaflet about aromasin exemestane and on the leaflet it says something about you take this with primary breast cancer and i got abit confused.... does this mean that the cancer has come back?
Posts.Title: can anyone answer me this question about aromasin exemestane?
